version_description: Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.

- Bug fixes and enhancements
- iPhone X Optimisation
- Bug fixes
Fixed an issue where some users were seeing zero calculations in a session.
Bug fixes and enhancements
Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

We've performed some small changes to how the calculations are fetched and stored on your device during the calculation phase - this should result in less data usage for most users. We've also resolved a small issue where the calculation interface may represent an inaccurate state.

We've performed some small changes to how the calculations are fetched and stored on your device during the calculation phase - this should result in less data usage for most users. We've also resolved a small issue where the calculation interface may represent an inaccurate state. We've also resolved a small issue that was occurring for some users when sending results back to DreamLab.
DreamLab is a global app - we've added in Flags for every Research Project so you can easily identify where in the world your calculations are being used to speed up Cancer Research!

Attention Dreamers! We have an updated Project in DreamLab:

Welcome into the Phase 2 of this large multiphase scientific project called DRUGS (for "Drugs Repurposing Using Grids of Smartphones")  which aims to determine how different cancer types can be treated with existing drugs or their combinations. Thanks to your contribution, this speeds up the drug discovery process by re-purposing drugs, therefore providing more effective anti-cancer treatments, quicker. Using your phone's processing power and an algorithm contained within the app, when you power DreamLab you will calculate how different drugs and new combinations of drugs can be used as a treatment for different cancer types based on genetic data from cancer patients. DreamLab provides the computing power needed to determine how different genetic mutations affect the drug outcomes.

As always, when it comes to the search for a better anti-cancer treatment, no "fast" is ever fast enough, thus we are aiming to speed up research even further with the results already obtained, thanks to your effort and support of DreamLab and DRUGS project. We have already processed the partial results obtained so far from the Phase 1 of this project and started a faster Phase 2 to focus on genetically tailored individual drug recommendations, to be followed soon by the more complex Phase 3 and Phase 4 on combinatorial treatment possibilities.

Please support the new phases of the project as they become available and this new Phase 2 especially! We need you! Thanks to your help and contribution we can help beat cancer faster and more effectively! Let's not just dream about the World without cancer, but #SleepLikeAHero to actually help it happen!

Attention Dreamers! We have a new Project in DreamLab!

Project Demystify seeks to understand, or connect the dots, between physical human traits – hair colour, eye colour, height and, at times, symptoms of disease – and their genetic basis. DreamLab’s citizen scientists will help crunch the complex calculations required to determine the most appropriate correlation test for different traits.

Dr Warren Kaplan, Chief of Informatics at the Garvan Institute, said the DreamLab app showed the power of ‘citizen science’ – where members of the community make a tangible impact on research progress.

“There are many important research questions we’d like to ask, but some need so much computing power that it would cost too much, or take us years and years. DreamLab has given us free access to a dedicated virtual supercomputer to accelerate our cancer research, giving more hope to patients and their families.”

Introducing Siri Shortcuts! The latest version of DreamLab is now compatible with this fantastic iOS 12 Feature - give it a go today and make DreamLab even easier to power.

This release also includes minor bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fix for some users who were having trouble completing calculations.
Minor fixes and performance improvements
Minor fixes and performance improvements
Minor fixes and performance improvements

- Performance and stability improvements
- Added Italian language support
- Added project 3D Genome

- Added Romanian language support
- Additional minor improvements
We've added a pilot for the new iOS background ability for the 3D Genome project.

•Added Spanish region and language support.
•Performance and stability improvements.
•Additional minor improvements.
Minor improvements

DreamLab has been updated with the addition of a Coronavirus research project, so that you can also help to fight COVID-19 in your sleep.

 In this latest release, we have also added:
- Regional support for Germany, Portugal, South Africa, Ghana and Lesotho.
- The ability to receive push notifications, to keep you more up to date with the latest from DreamLab. 
- A new research project from AIRC Italy: 3D Genome Phase 2. 
- An updated splash screen. 
- Performance improvements.

•Regional support for Ireland, Greece, The Netherlands and Albania.
•Performance improvements.
•Additional minor updates and improvements.
Updates to the Projects screen.

• We’ve added the functionality to allow for a few seconds of interrupted charging or internet before DreamLab stops processing.
• Localisation for Czech Republic and Democratic Republic of Congo.
• Clearer error messaging.
• Additional minor improvements.

We’ve added new statistics to the app so that users can better understand project progress and how their contribution is making a difference. We’ve also added some new error messaging for when DreamLab is left in the background and added a new in-app option about push notifications.
